text: ۞قَدۡ يَعۡلَمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُعَوِّقِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلۡقَآئِلِينَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡ هَلُمَّ إِلَيۡنَاۖ وَلَا يَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡبَأۡسَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا

translation.en: Already Allah knows the hinderers among you and those [hypocrites] who say to their brothers, "Come to us," and do not go to battle, except for a few
translation.id: Sungguh, Allah mengetahui orang-orang yang menghalang-halangi di antara kamu dan orang yang berkata kepada saudara-saudaranya, "Marilah bersama kami." Tetapi mereka datang berperang hanya sebentar
